name: lifework
content:

Your lifework is the work that is most important to you and to which you give a lot of time and effort: Her garden was her lifework. The environmentalist was honored for her life work in a special ceremony. Synonym
life's work
More examplesFewer examplesWhat influences led to your choice of acting as your lifework? This cave is the centerpiece of the couple's lifework to save cave ecosystems in the region. As a leading force for civil rights and civil liberties, and expander of democracy, his lifework will inspire political activitists for a long time.
